## DialogMetadataSelectorComponentData.setMetadata() method

Method that is used for sending metadata out of component to metadata selector

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setMetadata(metadata: TMetadata): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  metadata | <code>TMetadata</code> | Metadata that were changed in component passed back to selector |

<b>Returns:</b>

`any`
